welcome_message_body: Welcome to Gwangyang, South Korea! Get ready to experience the charm of this coastal city known for its beautiful beaches, delicious seafood, and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything this vibrant city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sacheon Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.
